org.jboss.windup.util.xml

Class LocationAwareContentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.xml.sax.ext.DefaultHandler2
        • org.jboss.windup.util.xml.LocationAwareContentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler, DeclHandler, EntityResolver2, LexicalHandler

    public class LocationAwareContentHandler
extends DefaultHandler2
    A SAX ContentHandler which stores the location of each node into that node's setUserData().
